body:
**Weekdays** (usual locations)

* **M:** Womxn Run The Herd 6:00pm (Brooks Trailhead)
* **T:** Graze & Chill- run & potluck 6:00pm- monthly
* W﻿omxn Run the Herd morning edition (urban trails) 6:30am bi-weekly
* ﻿Tuesday Trail Turn Up 6:30pm women-trans-femme-nonbinary trail run with social (Issaquah)- bi-weekly
* **W:**  Werkout Wednesday 6:30am (Lower Woodland Park track)
* **Th:** Thirsty Thursday 6:30am trail run (Issaquah)
* Thirsty Seconds 6:30pm roads with social (North Transfer Station Playground)

**Weekends**

* Smooth Mooves - trail adventures usually with camping- monthly
* W﻿omxn Run the Herd weekend edition - trail adventures usually with camping - monthly
* Silky & Filthy - run with folding saws and clear trails
* Volunteering - aid stations at races - frequently

  ![A group of trail runners at the trailhead before a Smooth Mooves group run.](/media/img_7348-1-.jpg)
*
*
metaDescription: View the weekly schedule of fun running events hosted by Cowgill. Join group runs on Thursdays, workouts on Wednesdays, and longer weekend trail runs.
title: Cowgill Events
